column2: ENGLISH
Raise Black Knight from death
My good standing with the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s allows me to request that they riase a powerful warrior from death to serve me for several years
Awaken undead army
if I'm to win this war I must ask the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s to give me an army of the undead, my land has plenty of undisturbed bodies that can be used for this purpose
Charm target
Cast a confusing charm that will improve the targets relation with you
Welcome brother
I grow in power
Departed for the eastern lands
It's time for me to leave this western land and small inhabitants
A hulking man clad from head to toe in steel armor was brought before me today, he claims to come from Eastern lands beyond the mana wastes
That's impossible, isn't it?
If nothing else he'll make a good warrior
I'm now vulnerable to being corrupted by my faith in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
My prayers have been answered, I now hear quiet whispers from [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] inside my mind as I rest
If I focus I can hear them in the day too
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been teaching me, and now I feel different, my mind is warping into a reflection of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s will
Give me your wisdom O' Unending Hunger!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been teaching me, and now I feel different, my mind is warping into a reflection of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s will
My mind is yours
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been teaching me, and now I feel different, my mind is warping into a reflection of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s will
whatever
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been teaching me, and now I feel different, my mind is warping into a reflection of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s will
ah hahahaha, tell me another one!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been teaching me, and now I feel different, my mind is warping into a reflection of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s will
I'll kill anyone who halts the Discourse
The Terror has choosen me, as all life flows from His will, so to does all knowledge
Ave Temores
The Wrath has an unbreakable hold on my mind, I'm fully given to his will. Now he wishes to alter my body
I'm your obdient tool master
I'm your servent, not your slave
My body is mine, I cast thee out
The Hunger has an unbreakable hold on my mind, I'm fully given to his will. Now he wishes to alter my body
I'm your obdient tool master
I'm your servent, not your slave
My body is mine, I cast thee out
The Apathy has an unbreakable hold on my mind, I'm fully given to his will. Now he wishes to alter my body
fine
I'm good
My body is mine, I cast thee out
The Curiosity has an unbreakable hold on my mind, I'm fully given to his will. Now he wishes to alter my body
I'm your obdient tool master
I'm your servent, not your slave
My body is mine, I cast thee out
The Discourse has an unbreakable hold on my mind, I'm fully given to his will. Now he wishes to alter my body
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
AHHHHH
My body is mine, I cast thee out
The Terror has an unbreakable hold on my mind, I'm fully given to his will. Now he wishes to alter my body
I'm your obdient tool master
I'm your servent, not your slave
My body is mine, I cast thee out
I've decided to demand my freedom in a trial by combat.
Guard! Get your master!
One of my prisioners has demanded a trial by combat. As a lord I may choose if I wish to honor this request.
The rat has no honor, there shall be no duel.
Someone fetch me my armor!
Fetch my Champion.
I have found your request to be made without honor and unbecomming your station, so I shall decline.
[from.GetSheHeCap]'s scared.
Your request has merrit and in the eyes of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] you shall be judged.
may [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] guide my arm.
Steel yourself for you will be fighting to defened the honor of your lord.
For the lord!
Your request has merrit and in the eyes of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] you shall be judged.
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] guide my arm.

[From.GetFirstName] looks pathetic as [from.GetSheHe]'s brought up from the dungeon. The court grows quiet as [from.GetSheHe] is given her blade, I can hear my heartbeat as I size [from.GetHerHim ] up.
[from.GetSheHeCap]'s unsure, one good flurry should end this quickly.
I have the upper hand, this will be over soon.
[From.GetFirstName] has some skill, but I'll show them true mettle.
Parry, reposte, deflect! Enguarde!
I like a challenge!
What have I got my self into [From.GetFirstName] is a professional
AHHHHHHH!
All I can hear is my breath and the clash of swords. Sweat drips down my brow as another overhand comes in, but this time I'm ready.
A swift sidestep, followed by a thurst and this is all over.
[from.GetHerHisCap]'s grip is weak, one strong parry and that sword is gone!
Ride this out, [from.GetFirstName]'s tired, a few more parrys and they'll yield.
Every muscle hurts, and I can't tell if that last parry was clean, There's something dripping down my neck but I can't tell if it's blood or sweat. [from.getfirstnamecap] prepares for a final attack.
A final strike, I ready my blade as my shoulder cries out in agony.
I yield! You win [From.GetFirstName].
I don't think I have enough to keep going, but I'll block this last blow.

It was over in a flash, one last clash of blades. A brilliant sidestep and one last blow with all my strength had [FromFrom.GetFirstName] on their knees. In minutes I was released, given a horse and told next time I wouldn't be so lucky
That wasn't luck!
I hesitated only a fraction of a second and then my sword met [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s and sent it clattering to the floor. I wish I had said something clever now but all I could do is ask "Yield?"
At last, homeward!
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s sword bit into me, but I made sure they couldn't pull it out, with blood dripping down my side I was able to demand a victory
By [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] that strings.
One last charge, and a powerful strike, alas my sword went flying but it was coated in [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s blood.
A defeat, but a glorious one.
"I Yield" I cry out, voice horse from the duel, my sword clatters on the ground. In moments the Guards grab me and drag me back to my cell.
I have been found wanting.
The blows didn't stop, once my offense fell off [FromFrom.GetFirstName] drew upon energy reserves to hammer me and eventually got though my guard.
I had better not let this get infected.
I couldn't keep up, suddenly [From.GetFirstName] was next to me and then all I can remember is agony.
I hope I didn't scream.
I've defeated [FromFrom.GetFirstName] in an honorable duel, and so I will now be departing, you [GetFromRootInsult].
DAMN YOU!
My fingers ached, and my lungs were on fire, as my sword came down [from.getfirstname]'s came up, I remember hearing a metalic clatter and the touch of cold iron on my neck
Well fought
I know I got through, seeing [From.GetFirstName] still standing was worring, that I couldn't pull my sword out of them was horrific.
A loss, but one purchased in blood
may [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] chase you until your death. You may have defeated me but you haven't broken my spirit
Keep talking like that and I'll make sure you never see daylight again
The last few seconds of the fight were a blur, I must have been fighting on instinct. But when I came too, [From.GetFirstName] was being taken back to their cell
and some damn good instincts too
